Comment: It's only recently I've been reading about Curtis Yarvin, Balaji Srinivasan, etc. Was already familiar with Musk, and Peter Theil. Regarding Yarvin, Srinivasan, etc, I didn't realize there's a whole tech bro movement to create technofeudalism societies both in the US and elsewhere.    Can't help but wonder if thats part of Trump's motivation on acquiring Greenland. Wasn't too long ago Trump was talking about creating "freedom towns." Now Musk is getting his own town, Starbase. Revenge of the Nerds meets The Empire Strikes Back. ​
